hideCount.description: Whether segment count should be hidden. Defaults to 'false'

isActive.description: Whether the segment is marked as active. Defaults to 'false'.

isCompleted.description: Whether the segment is marked as completed. Defaults to 'false'.

progress.description: Progress level of the segment. Defaults to '0'.

separator.description: Separator between count text and segment label. Applicable only to horizontal or linear mode. Defaults to '-'.
